markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Elemental Tsunami](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2992)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Elemental tsunamis are huge and destructive, having none of the caring or nurturing aspects of water.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 28

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Elemental Tsunami](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2992)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=533" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=587" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=732" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 149 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Thalassic](/Languages.aspx?ID=113)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +23

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +6

**Con** +6

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Waterbound** When not touching water, the elemental tsunami is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) and can't use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 31 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +22 

**Will** +19 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 195

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696)

**Resistances**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) 10

**Vortex** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=732)) 50 feet. Water in the area that is in the same body of water as the elemental tsunami is [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) for [Swimming](/Actions.aspx?ID=2381)creatures that don't have the [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=732) trait.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet, swim 100 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
wave +24 ([reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+12 bludgeoning plus [Push](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=47) or [Pull](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=71) 10 feet

**Drench** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) The elemental puts out all fires in a 20-foot emanation. It extinguishes all non-magical fires automatically and attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) magical fires (+20 counteract modifier).

**Surge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The elemental tsunami momentarily expands to fill the area of its vortex. Creatures within the aura take 5d12+6 bludgeoning damage with a DC 31 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save. A creature that fails this save is pushed 20 feet. The elemental tsunami then shrinks to its normal space and can't Surge again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-412" />
name: Elemental Tsunami

It extinguishes all non-magical fires automatically and attempts to counteract magical fires (+20 counteract modifier). Surge Two Actions The elemental tsunami momentarily expands to fill the area of its vortex. Creatures within the aura take 5d12+6 bludgeoning damage with a DC 31 basic Fortitude save. A creature that fails this save is pushed 20 feet. The elemental tsunami then shrinks to its normal space and can't Surge again for 1d4 rounds.
